version_description: Added capo to simplify playing, corrected chord alignment over lyrics, defined chords.
This version uses a capo and is 100% correct on chords.

Basic acoustic version for strumming without any intro (don't think it needs it though). Strumming pattern that sounds best to me is continuous up/down strumming with emphasized strums at the start of chord changes.
I've included some riffs for the chorus, and also the correct lyrics. Also none of the other tabs combine G/F# with Em properly.
Standard tuning, no capo and bar chords needed. Perfect version for beginners.
First tab in this tuning with completely original chords.
Capo 2 version with intro riff and sus chords added.
100% accurate as per the video and tuning, including subtle chord variations used by Chris Martin.
